channel.title: 《StarDict for N800的测试安装包》的评论

item.title: 作者：无力
item.dc:creator: 无力
item.description: 我是新手，下载字典后解压，在N800中没找到media目录， 自建目录/media/mmc1/stardict/dic/后将字典复制进去，但还是识别不到字典，求解？！
item.content:encoded:
我是新手，下载字典后解压，在N800中没找到media目录，
自建目录/media/mmc1/stardict/dic/后将字典复制进去，但还是识别不到字典，求解？！

item.title: 作者：Alex
item.dc:creator: Alex
item.description: Dear wolfg, Thank You Very Much, I can make it.
item.content:encoded:
Dear wolfg,
Thank You Very Much, I can make it.

item.title: 作者：wolfg
item.dc:creator: wolfg
item.description: Alex, you can use 7-Zip (http://www.7-zip.org/download.html) to uncompress "stardict-DrEye4in1-2.4.2.tar.bz2" on Windows, then put the directory "stardict-DrEye4in1-2.4.2 " under “/media/mmc1/stardict/dic”.
item.content:encoded: Alex, you can use 7-Zip (http://www.7-zip.org/download.html) to uncompress "stardict-DrEye4in1-2.4.2.tar.bz2" on Windows, then put the directory "stardict-DrEye4in1-2.4.2 " under “/media/mmc1/stardict/dic”.

item.title: 作者：Alex
item.dc:creator: Alex
item.description: Dear Wolfg, I have a problem to install the tar file into my n800 as follows: - (i) I had already installed the stardict; (ii) I downloaded the "stardict-DrEye4in1-2.4.2.tar" file (without unzip) and put it under the directory "/media/mmc1/stardict/dic"; After call the stardict, it shows "no dictionary". I didn't know what's going on because I couldn't unzip the tar file by using winzip, etc and therefore I put the original tar file into the directory. Can you help me to solve the problem? Thanks in advance.
item.content:encoded:
Dear Wolfg,
I have a problem to install the tar file into my n800 as follows: -
(i) I had already installed the stardict;
(ii) I downloaded the "stardict-DrEye4in1-2.4.2.tar" file (without unzip) and put it under the directory "/media/mmc1/stardict/dic";
After call the stardict, it shows "no dictionary".
I didn't know what's going on because I couldn't unzip the tar file by using winzip, etc and therefore I put the original tar file into the directory.
Can you help me to solve the problem?
Thanks in advance.

item.title: 作者：wolfg
item.dc:creator: wolfg
item.description: Thank you! Let's discuss in the developer forum.
item.content:encoded: Thank you! Let's discuss in the developer forum.

item.title: 作者：Li, Zhao
item.dc:creator: Li, Zhao
item.description: Hi, wolfg too busy these two days. I am writing a post in stardict development forum now.
item.content:encoded:
Hi, wolfg
too busy these two days. I am writing a post in stardict development forum now.

item.title: 作者：wolfg
item.dc:creator: wolfg
item.description:
Hi lizhao,
The missing library on 770 are solved. I faced the same core dump problem as you. Have you got a solution for this memory leak problem? Can you explain it to me?
item.content:encoded:
Hi lizhao,

The missing library on 770 are solved. I faced the same core dump problem as you. Have you got a solution for this memory leak problem? Can you explain it to me?

item.title: 作者：Peter Fang
item.dc:creator: Peter Fang
item.description: 路径改完了，现在正常了！ :D

item.title: 作者：Peter Fang
item.dc:creator: Peter Fang
item.description: 哦，原来不是我的错。 :P 我马上试试去，呵呵。多谢wolfg老兄！！
item.content:encoded:
哦，原来不是我的错。 :P
我马上试试去，呵呵。多谢wolfg老兄！！

item.title: 作者：wolfg
item.dc:creator: wolfg
item.description:
非常抱歉！我把目录写错了！
假设你的词典是stardict-DrEye4in1-2.4.2 词典文件的位置是这样的 /media/mmc1/stardict/dic/stardict-DrEye4in1-2.4.2/DrEye4in1.dict.dz /media/mmc1/stardict/dic/stardict-DrEye4in1-2.4.2/DrEye4in1.idx /media/mmc1/stardict/dic/stardict-DrEye4in1-2.4.2/DrEye4in1.ifo
item.content:encoded:
非常抱歉！我把目录写错了！

假设你的词典是stardict-DrEye4in1-2.4.2
词典文件的位置是这样的
/media/mmc1/stardict/dic/stardict-DrEye4in1-2.4.2/DrEye4in1.dict.dz /media/mmc1/stardict/dic/stardict-DrEye4in1-2.4.2/DrEye4in1.idx
/media/mmc1/stardict/dic/stardict-DrEye4in1-2.4.2/DrEye4in1.ifo

item.title: 作者：Peter Fang
item.dc:creator: Peter Fang
item.description: 不好意思，我是StarDict新手，刚刚装了N800版本，把几个词典文件解压完毕放在/media/mmc1/dic目录中，StarDict启动后怎么找不到呢？Please help! Thanks!
item.content:encoded: 不好意思，我是StarDict新手，刚刚装了N800版本，把几个词典文件解压完毕放在/media/mmc1/dic目录中，StarDict启动后怎么找不到呢？Please help! Thanks!

item.title: 作者：wolfg
item.dc:creator: wolfg
item.description:
Hi lizhao,
Can you join the stardict project @garage? We can talk about this issue in the developer forum.
The problem I faced is on 770 the library libSM.so can't be found.
item.content:encoded:
Hi lizhao,

Can you join the stardict project @garage? We can talk about this issue in the developer forum.

The problem I faced is on 770 the library libSM.so can't be found.

item.title: 作者：Li, Zhao
item.dc:creator: Li, Zhao
item.description:
hi, wolfg
on n800, i guess the memory problem is also repeated if 'ulimit -v 95000; ulimit -m 65000'
item.content:encoded:
hi, wolfg

on n800, i guess the memory problem is also repeated if 'ulimit -v 95000; ulimit -m 65000'

item.title: 作者：Li, Zhao
item.dc:creator: Li, Zhao
item.description:
The above problem cause returning wrong result on 770.
After testing again, found memory alloc problem is still there.
item.content:encoded:
The above problem cause returning wrong result on 770.

After testing again, found memory alloc problem is still there.
